result.execSummary:
The defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Firearm-Convicted of Out-of-State Felony, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court advised the defendant that as a convicted felon, he may never own or possess a firearm.  Court advised defendant that he may not vote until his civil rights have been restored.

The Court ordered the defendant to provide a DNA sample.  The Court ordered the defendant to pay all mandatory costs, fees, and surcharges (including DNA) by October 24, 2023.  Court waived all non-mandatory court costs, fees, and surcharges.  Failure to pay shall result in a civil judgment.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gerald Marquis Gillie

records.addlTxt:
Case proceeded to sentencing. Statements by the State, Defense and Defendant.

AS TO COUNT 1:
The Court sentenced the defendant to serve 288 DAYS in the House of Correction with credit for 288 DAYS. A TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

The Court ordered the defendant to provide a DNA sample.  The Court ordered the defendant to pay all mandatory costs, fees, and surcharges (including DNA) by October 24, 2023.  Court waived all non-mandatory court costs, fees, and surcharges.  Failure to pay shall result in a civil judgment.

Appellate rights given to defendant.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie in court, in custody.  Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court for Gerald Marquis Gillie.  Attorney James C Griffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for jury trial.  However, parties have reached an agreement.  Court found the State has satisfied victims' rights law.  Plea negotiations set forth on the record and agreed upon by the parties.  Defendant sworn. 

AS TO COUNT 1:
Defendant changes plea to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to plea, advised of Constitutional Rights and the maximum penalties. Defendant further advised that if not a US citizen, deportation is possible. Court found that the defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived rights.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights form, Addendum, and Elements/Jury Instructions received and filed. Parties stipulate to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant GUILTY and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  

Court advised the defendant that as a convicted felon, he may never own or possess a firearm.  Court advised defendant that he may not vote until his civil rights have been restored.  

Sentencing proceeded.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, in custody.  Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court for Gerald Marquis Gillie.  Attorney James C Griffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Final PreTrial with Defendant's other case 22CF1340. Discussion placed on the record. Defense advised the Court, of possible resolution. Defense has received new offer has been received from the State, however Defense has not reviewed offer with Defendant. Court will leave matter on Trial calendar at this time. Court ordered case adjourned for Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 2. 

Jury Trial scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 9:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 635 of the Courthouse.

Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court, defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, in custody.  Amanda Korin Kirklewski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND. Defense requests a final pretrial and jury trial date. Case adjourned, Branch 2.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference rescheduled from 07-28-2022 to 08-03-2022 at 1:30 pm, Branch 02

Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court, defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held off the record via Zoom. Defense requests a status conference date. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom. Status conference scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, defendant in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for status of counsel. SPD has not yet appointed counsel. Court orders case adjourned for a State v Lee hearing. Clerk notified SPD. Case adjourend, Branch 2 via Zoom. Hearing scheduled for June 23, 2022 at 8:30 am.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, defendant in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Status of Conference.  The status conference was HELD OFF THE RECORD in person.  No counsel has been appointed by the Public Defender's Office.  The court Order the matter adjourned for GOOD CAUSE back to Branch 2.  Status conference scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, defendant in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for status of counsel. SPD has not yet appointed counsel. Case rescheduled off the record. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, defendant in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for status of counsel. SPD has not yet appointed counsel. Case rescheduled off the record. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for April 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie in court with Attorney Charles Robert Roozen.  Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Court took judicial notice of the defendants felony conviction in Iowa. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer E. Neitman. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 02.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. SPD to appoint Attorney Roozen pending a conflict check. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie in court with attorney Charles Robert Roozen.  Defendant Gerald Marquis Gillie in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Gerald Marquis Gillie appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Gerald Marquis Gillie
Current: 8889 N 91st Street, Milwaukee, WI 53224   (Effective: 01-14-2022)
Prior: 4533 South 23rd Street # 103, Milwaukee, WI 53216
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
